name: UCSF Alliance Health Project
description: UCSF Alliance Health Project (AHP) supports the mental health and wellness of the lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, and queer (LGBTQ) and HIV-affected communities in constructing healthy and meaningful lives. The AHP Services Center offers a broad range of Support Groups, Behavioral and Sexual Health services including: - Case Management - Gender Health - Support Groups - Psychiatry - Psychotherapy - Substance Use Counseling
